context.description: You cannot create use case description file by yourself, please using the use case diagram to create
Visual Paradigm not allow different editor referenced to same diagram
Visual Paradigm not support duplicate window
You can start the Visual Paradigm form the project's popup menu or Diagram Navigator view

Visual Paradigm supports latest UML 2.0 diagrams. You can enjoy the analysis, design, development, testing and deployment in a single environment. It speeds the application development lifecycle by integrating the Eclipse platform within one-stop-shop solution. Visual Paradigm also automates tedious tasks that can distract developers from development.
